title: Center for Collective Use of Scientific Instruments (CCUSI)
equipment1: 1. Benchtop scanning electron microscope with thermionic cathode «Coxem EM-40», «COXEM CO., LTD», Republic of Korea.
equipmentDescription: Benchtop scanning electron microscope with thermionic cathode, model: «Coxem EM-40», brand: «Coxem», manufacturer: «COXEM CO., LTD», country of origin: Republic of Korea (South Korea), year of manufacture/supply to CCUSI: 2024.
applicationArea: The benchtop scanning electron microscope «Coxem EM-40» is designed for detailed studies of the structure of ferrous metal and alloy samples on the surface and in thin layers with high resolution.
equipment2Description: Optical microscope, model «AXIOVERT 200M MAT», manufacturer «CARL ZEISS», country of origin Germany, year of manufacture/supply to CCUSI: 2007.
equipment2ApplicationArea: The microscope enables research of the structure of metals and alloys in reflected light using the following methods:
equipment2Methods: differential interference contrast in circular polarization.
equipment3: 3. Microhardness tester Vickers, «LHV5-1000Z», «CHONGQING LEEB INSTRUMENT CO., LTD», China.
equipment3Description: Microhardness tester Vickers, model: «LHV5-1000Z», brand: «LEEB», manufacturer: «CHONGQING LEEB INSTRUMENT CO., LTD», country of origin: China, year of manufacture/supply to CCUSI: 2024.
equipment3ApplicationArea: The microhardness tester is designed for hardness measurements on the Vickers scale of small parts, thin wire or strip, thin surface layers, coatings, etc. The scope of application is the assessment of hardness of individual phases or structural components of alloys, as well as the difference in hardness of individual areas of these components in steels and alloys.
equipment3Magnification: Thanks to the revolver mounting device for 6 objectives (×1.25, ×5, ×10, ×20, ×50, ×100), automatic magnification change is provided. The maximum magnification of the microscope is ×1500.
equipment3MotorizedFunctions: The microscope has motorized adjustment functions: setting the objective to the working position, setting the illumination, autofocus, setting beam splitters for different contrast methods.
equipment3Software: The microscope software contains a set of functions for image enhancement, such as changing contrast, smoothing, image sharpness, noise removal, as well as for performing the following operations:
equipment3Operations: automatic determination of grain size (number) in steels according to ISO, EN, ASTM, JIS and DSTU standards, in particular DSTU 8972:2019 and DSTU 9074:2021.
equipment3Analysis: The software allows for automatic analysis of the size and volume of particles of different phases (phase components) in the structure of metals and alloys.
equipment3Stage: The microscope stage is motorized, enabling operation in surface scanning mode of the studied samples.
contactName: Parusov Eduard Volodymyrovych, Head of the Department of Metal Heat Treatment for Mechanical Engineering, Dr. of Tech. Sci., Senior Researcher.
